ActJudges Act
SubjectElizabeth Cusson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Robert J. Cusson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ELIZABETH CUSSON, widow of the Honourable Robert J. Cusson, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, effective May 18, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
